mapper.sql: select distinct result.role_id, result.role_name, result.role_key, result.role_sort, result.data_scope, result.menu_check_strictly, result.dept_check_strictly, result.status, result.del_flag, result.create_time, result.remark from sys_role result left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = result.role_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = sur.user_id left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id
mapper.select: select result.role_id from sys_role result left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = result.role_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = sur.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}

select result.role_id, result.role_name, result.role_key, result.role_sort, result.data_scope, result.status from sys_role result WHERE result.del_flag = '0' and result.role_id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId})
